nodes.text: Til was a star located in the Til system, deep within the Unknown Regions. It was orbited by the technologically advanced world Tililix, which was the homeworld of the sentient Tarro species. Nearly a century before the Battle of Yavin, Til exploded with little warning, destroying Tililix in the process.

Only those Tarro who were off-world at the time survived the cataclysm, with the remaining members of the nearly-extinct species numbering merely 350 individuals. Those Tarro who lived in other star systems speculated that the destruction of Til could have been caused by a secret Tarro-constructed superweapon.
Til was created by C. Robert Carey and introduced in Galaxy Guide 12: Aliens — Enemies and Allies, a 1995 sourcebook for use with West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
